Text: What happened in Japan was a huge Tragedy and i dont want to sound like im making light of it but is anyone else think its strange that certain songs are on this album like...Rihanna - Only Girl, Kings of Leon - Use Somebody - personally i think its just a little bit unsuitable!!!
@ProOn it's made not to be suitable or adhere to the losses in Japan, but to raise money. People buy the album and the proceeds go to the relief efforts in Japan.
